## Attempting Homework Lab 1, attempt 1

The difference between R and R studio is that R is the coding language being used and R studio is an easy way to code the language. Github is a place to store written code and share it with other users. It is useful as a resource for everyone and can allow you to integrate building block chunks of code into your own.
